arts.ttl: Manchester United XI vs Brentford – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Manchester United travel to Brentford on Saturday in search of a second consecutive Premier League victory, a feat they are yet to achieve under Ruben Amorim. A dramatic win over Chelsea last weekend has lifted spirits at Old Trafford, but consistency has so far eluded the Red Devils this season. The trip to West London […] The post Manchester United XI vs Brentford – Predicted lineup and team news first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Brentford vs. Man Utd: Preview, Predictions and Lineups
arts.sum: Ruben Amorim is aiming to oversee back-to-back Premier League wins for the first time.

arts.ttl: Rock bottom? No... why Man Utd got worse after 4-0 loss at Brentford
arts.sum: A 4-0 defeat at Brentford in 2022 was seen as "rock bottom" for Manchester United, but things got worse for the Old Trafford club.

arts.ttl: Ruben Amorim fires warning to his Man Utd players for Brentford trip as poor form laid bare
arts.sum: Manchester United have the chance to win back-to-back Premier League games for the first time in the Ruben Amorim era when they travel to Brentford on Saturday afternoon

arts.ttl: Ruben Amorim sees Brentford game as ‘massive’ as Man Utd bid to build momentum
arts.sum: The Red Devils are targeting successive Premier League victories.

arts.ttl: Seven players could miss Brentford vs Man Utd after Ruben Amorim drops injury update
arts.sum: Ruben Amorim's Manchester United are preparing to face Brentford in the Premier League on Saturday lunchtime, but both sides will be without a number of players for the clash

arts.ttl: Former Premier League star who played for Man Utd and Brentford now unemployed at 28
arts.sum: The ex-Manchester United and Brentford star is now on the hunt for a new club after becoming a free agent

arts.ttl: Mbeumo returns to Brentford as Manchester United’s early bright spark
arts.sum: Mbeumo’s only Premier League goal came in United’s 3-2 win at home against Burnley last month and there is no doubt that he needs to rediscover the goalscoring touch that led to his summer move. Yet, Mbeumo’s best display came last week when United registered their second league win of the campaign with a 2-1 home victory over Chelsea which included the forward extracting a last-man challenge from Robert Sanchez that saw the visitors’ goalkeeper sent off after just four minutes.

arts.ttl: Amorim: Man Utd face 'most important game for a long time' against Brentford
arts.sum: Manchester United boss Ruben Amorim admits he doesn't know what he will get from his squad each week.

arts.ttl: Manchester United XI vs Brentford: Confirmed team news, predicted lineup and injury latest for Premier League
arts.sum: No Amad Diallo or Noussair Mazraoui as Red Devils look to build on chaotic win over Chelsea
